user_query: I'm organizing a school project on marine biodiversity and I need to group fish species based on their classification. Can you group all the fishes according to their phylum and provide us with their scientific names and images? Additionally, we would like to scrape the email addresses and internal links from a specific website related to marine life.

TaskList.description: Gather data on various fish species including their classification, scientific names, and images.
required_inputs: database or API for fish classification

TaskList.description: Organize the gathered fish data according to their phylum.
Scrape email addresses and internal links from a specific website related to marine life.
required_inputs: URL of the website to scrape

TaskList.description: Compile the results from subtasks 2 and 3 into a final report.
